part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long un-wittnessed bulk of mechanical marvel competes for your peripheral even as your attention is drawn across its many valves, pistons, and plates of an {{SECRETGOLDEN|exotic material}}. Dust and debris break loose from the shelf of its {{giant|immense}} bredth and tumble, home-sick, as rocks might cascade down a mountain face. Several {{implanted|invasive interfaces}} hang like spilled innards, ready to bring the behemoth to life with the acquiescence of a willing tribute.

part.Name: CyberneticsBaseItem
part.BehaviorDescription: You are considered a gigantic creature while the exoframe is installed. You cannot wear equipment on your body.
